Define Documentation

#define assertThat   HC_assertThat

assertThat(actual, matcher) - Asserts that actual value satisfies matcher.

If the matcher is not satisfied, an exception describing the mismatch is thrown.

Synonym for HC_assertThat, available if HC_SHORTHAND is defined.

See also:
HC_assertThatWithLocation
#define HC_assertThat (   actual,
  matcher 
)    HC_assertThatWithLocation(self, actual, matcher, __FILE__, __LINE__)

Asserts that actual value satisfies matcher.

If the matcher is not satisfied, an exception describing the mismatch is thrown.

Synonym: assertThat

See also:
HC_assertThatWithLocation

Function Documentation

void HC_assertThatWithLocation ( id  testCase,
id  actual,
id< HCMatcher >  matcher,
const char *  fileName,
int  lineNumber 
)

Asserts that actual value satisfies matcher.

If the matcher is not satisfied, an exception describing the mismatch is thrown. If you have linked against a OCUnit-compatible testing framework, this exception is a test failure.

Parameters:
testCase A test case object that answers to -failWithException:
